Eclipse does not crash with Sun JRE.

This is not a CDT issue, whatever priority you give it, it isn't going to get
attention here. Please find an apprioritate home for this.

Hi,

I verified this bug with Eclipse 20040628 and CDT 200406301134, and I could

Pixy.
